lyrics.text:
Ka ‘oho mai ‘a māmani
‘Eiki ke ofi mai;
Pea ke fa’a fakahaofi
Hoku laumālie.

Ko e fu’u mālohi koe,
Pea lahi hake;
‘I he ngaahi mālohi,
‘O heli kotoa.

Pea u hanga hake, ‘Eiki
Ki ho fu’u mo’unga;
‘I he ‘amanaki lelei,
Te ke malu’i au.

‘E ‘Otua anga’ofa,
Fakaongoongo lelei;
‘A e huafa ‘o Sīsū,
Ko ho ‘Alo ia.

Ko e huafa ‘o Sīsū,
Ko e kalofanga;
Ki he kakai mafasia,
‘I he ‘enau hia.

Ko e huafa ko ia,
Ko e paami ia;
Ki he tu’utāmaki ia,
Mo e houhau ia.

He ko e me’a faito’o,
Ki he laumālie;
Ko ia pē ‘oku ‘aonga,
Pea ma’ungofua.
